result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (7th, 8th or 9th) and Operating w/ PAC (7th, 8th or 9th) .096. The defendant was found guilty of OWI (7th, 8th or 9th) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (7th, 8th or 9th) .096 was dismissed by the court.

  • James T. Roberts was found guilty of OWI (7th, 8th or 9th), a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:37 a.m. Court reporter via telephone. Defendant James T. Roberts in court, in custody, with attorney Patrick Howard Finlan.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf140 and 15tr1462.  State moves to dismiss Counts 2 and 3 in 15cf140 and Count 1 in 15tr1462 - Granted. Plea questionaire filed. Defendant enters no contest plea.   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty. Michlig/Finlan/Roberts/Court statement to sentencing. Ineligible Voting Notice provided.
Court Sentence
Prison - 3 years initial confinement, 3 years extended supervision - CC with revocation sentence
CC/DNA Surcharge/IID Surcharge/Supervision Fees
Blood Draw surcharge
Eligible for earned release/substance abuse program
No intoxicants; no taverns except for purposes of employment
AODA treatment and recovery
Driver's safety plan
Driver's license revocation - 3 years
IID - 12 months
Jail credit - 98 days
DNA Sample
  The court informs defendant of right to request expungement of the DNA under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4).
Appeal rights given
Adj. 11:02 a.m.
and States Reply to Discovery
Pre-trial conference at 09-16-2015 10:00 am
Mr. Roberts is presently in custody.  He will pay the bill once we receive the total amount from Attorney Finlan. He is excuse because of incarceration for now from making his monthly payments.

03:43 pm - Defendant James T. Roberts in court with attorney Patrick Howard Finlan.  Defendant James T. Roberts in custody.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also calling 15tr1462.  Finlan in receipt of Information, waives reading and enters not guilty plea.  Bail continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 1, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
State's exhibits 1-3

Case called 2:20 p.m.:  Defendant James T. Roberts in court with attorney Patrick Howard Finlan.  Defendant James T. Roberts in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also calling 15TR1462.  Atty Michlig calls Officer Loduha sworn/direct.  Atty Finlan stipulates to identification of defendant.  Exhibit #1 marked/copy of Officer Herrmann's report.  Atty Finlan objects to exhibit being received and states reasons/court overrules and accepts exhibit.  Exhibit #2 marked/lab report/received.  States Exhibit #3 marked/Atty Finlan stipulates to this report/court accepts/cross.  Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over - bail continued.  Arraignment scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 03:30 pm. Adj. 02:38 p.m.

01:25 pm - Defendant James T. Roberts in court, via video,  with attorney Patrick Howard Finlan.  Defendant James T. Roberts in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, waive reading - set for preliminary hearing.  Finlan statement concerning bond.  Court continues existing bond.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 02:15 pm.
Approved

02:47 PM - Defendant James T. Roberts in court, in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court in receipt of PFAC and was found to be eligible.  Court has not been able to find attorney as of today's date to appoint.  Court adjourns.  Bail continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 8, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

02:44 pm - Defendant James T. Roberts in court, in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also calling 15tr1462.  Court questions defendant as to obtaining counsel. Defendant states was found to be ineligible for PD appointment.  Would like to file PFAC.  Bail continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 02:30 pm.  Adjourned 02:47 p.m.
